mapper.select: select a.id,a.oper_time,a.title,image.img_name,image.img_dir from agriculture_operation as a,img_rlation,image,resource where resource.id=a.resource_id and a.id=img_rlation.other_id and img_rlation.image_id=image.id and resource.master_id=#{mid} and image.type_code="maint_records" and a.resource_id=#{rid}
